name: Raspberry Picture Frame Slideshow
short_description:
If you need a slideshow of images for your Raspberry Pi micro computer (for digital signage or DIY picture frames purposes), just see how good Raspberry Picture Frame Slideshow is. 

Insert an USB key with images (actual files or even text URLs) inside and boot: the system will display a slideshow of them in a restricted full-screen view.

Raspberry Picture Frame Slideshow shows a full-screen view restricted to the slideshow; there is no way to escape this view but rebooting the machine. It is a hacker-proof secure operating systems for indoor and outdoor use.
summary: Images slideshow with a Raspberry Pi
